name: All Kamen Rider: Rider Revolution
overview: All Kamen Rider: Rider Revolution is a Japanese 2D Beat Em-Up Side-Scroller video game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment exclusively for the Nintendo DS. Serving as the sequel to All Kamen Rider: Rider Generation 2, it is the third installment of the All Kamen Rider Series and features all Riders previously available and introduces Gaim, Drive, Ghost, and Ex-Aid to the franchise as playable characters.
